turns.content:
generate a list for: Smoothie Bowl, Avocado Toast,

instructions without proportions,
you HAVE to include the calories

use this structure: 

Dish Name: Dish
Ingredients: 
1. ingredient (ammount) (unit)
2. ingredient (ammount) (unit)
Preparation time: min,
Calories: number,
Preparation Instructions: 
1. instruction
2. instruction

Dish Name: Smoothie Bowl
Ingredients:

1. Frozen berries (1 cup)
2. Banana (1)
3. Greek yogurt (1/2 cup)
4. Milk (1/2 cup)
5. Honey (1 tbsp)
6. Chia seeds (1 tbsp)
7. Granola (1/4 cup)
8. Fresh fruit (1/2 cup)
Preparation time: 5 min,
Calories: approximately 300,
Preparation Instructions:
9. In a blender, combine frozen berries, banana, Greek yogurt, milk, honey, and chia seeds. Blend until smooth.
10. Pour the smoothie mixture into a bowl.
11. Top with granola and fresh fruit.
12. Serve immediately and enjoy!

Dish Name: Avocado Toast
Ingredients:

1. Avocado (1)
2. Whole wheat bread (2 slices)
3. Salt (to taste)
4. Black pepper (to taste)
5. Lemon juice (1 tsp)
Preparation time: 5 min,
Calories: approximately 300,
Preparation Instructions:
6. Cut the avocado in half and remove the pit. Mash the avocado in a bowl.
7. Toast the bread slices.
8. Spread the mashed avocado on top of the toasted bread slices.
9. Sprinkle salt, black pepper, and lemon juice on top of the avocado.
10. Serve immediately and enjoy!
